text:
Lastline -- https://lastline.com | Santa Barbara, CA | Full Time | Onsite / Remote

Lastline is focused on real-time analysis of advanced malware and knowing the Internet's malicious infrastructure. Lastline leverages this threat intelligence to create advanced malware defenses for companies of all sizes.

â€¢ Front End Developer: Develop web-based applications to display security information to users and to support malware analysts in their work. Use AngularJS to develop our front end and use D3.js for graph data. Applicant must have AngularJS or other JavaScript framework experience and must know how to develop professional-looking web interfaces.

To apply, email jobs@lastline.com with your resume.
